projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description:
built full online store with React, Redux Toolkit, React Query
product listing, shopping cart, checkout flow
responsive design works on mobile and desktop
integrated real APIs for products and orders

used reusable components and clean state management
deployed live on Vercel for real users

projects.title: Mawazin Al-Sharq
projects.description: Real estate platform built with React. Optimized for high performance and strong SEO. Features advanced property search, filtering, and contract management. Fully responsive with a smooth user experience. Serves individual buyers and investors. Deployed for real users with clean architecture and modern development standards.

projects.title: AI Resume Analyzer
projects.description:
Analyzes resumes with AI to highlight strengths and weaknesses
Compares CVs against job descriptions with ATS system
Uses Claude-Sonnet-4 LLM to generate feedback and suggestions
Responsive design for phone and desktop
Built with modern front-end stack (React, TypeScript, Tailwind)

projects.title: Weather
projects.description:
fetches real-time weather data using OpenWeather API
shows 3-day forecast starting today

handles API errors and loading states

responsive UI for phone and desktop
tested core functions for accurate data

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Simple personal portfolio using pure HTML and CSS. One page layout with sections: Home, About, Projects, Contact. Clean responsive design without frameworks. Shows projects with title, image, description, and links. Easy to edit and deploy. Good for beginners learning structure and styling.

projects.title: Games
projects.description:
üß† Key Concepts API Integration: Uses JavaScript fetch to get live game data
Dynamic Cards: Builds game cards from API results.
Details Page: Opens detailed info for each game.
External Links: Direct button to visit the official game website
Vanilla JS: No frameworks, only pure JavaScript

experience.title: Bachelor's degree | Computer Science
experience.description: I studied computer and systems engineering, which provided me with a solid foundation in programming, algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. I also developed a strong understanding of computer architecture, operating systems, and computer networks.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description:
finished 150+ training hours in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript
built and deployed real web apps using modern stack
used libraries like React Router, Redux, Tailwind, Framer Motion

practiced API integration, state management, reusable components
worked with Git and GitHub to manage code
contributed to open-source tasks and workshops
improved teamwork and communication during projects

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description: Developed and launched a full real estate platform from scratch using React. Focused on high performance and strong SEO to support real users. Built advanced property search, filtering, and contract management features. Implemented responsive UI optimized for both mobile and desktop. Integrated real APIs to handle listings and inquiries. Applied clean architecture, reusable components, and modern state management. Used Git and GitHub for version control and deployment on Vercel. Collaborated closely with the client to refine requirements and deliver a production-ready solution.
